stories.text:
“Ancient Beat”[0] was posted recently and it’s a super fun way —as a non-archaeologist, anyway— to learn about interesting happenings in an interesting field. What other similar sources of curated, topic-specific news do you read?

0: https://ancientbeat.substack.com/
stories.title: Ask HN: The week’s X news” for interesting X?
IntyOS, an operating system for the Intellivision (2003)
Microsoft detects surge in Linux XorDDoS malware activity
Tom Brown Is on a Mission to Restore Appalachia's Rare and Lost Apples (2021)
Rising temperatures are adding to India’s cold chain woes
Build Your Own Customizable Content Aggregator
Sri Lanka closes schools and limits work to combat fuel shortage

stories.text:
This question is needed to be answered for doing some discussions about should the CS be 8-th of the Liberal Art [1]. Also this is the questions which I am fond of for years and years, one of my favorite ones if not the favorite. So:

Why are you doing what you are doing?

I have already gathered 2 not bad answers: Lust and Because I Can. Please can you enrich my understanding of such a crucial question of human being with some more great answers or some cool philosopher's works I haven't been introduced to?

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31437375
stories.title: Ask HN: Why humans do what they do?
